title: Early Childhood Programming Robotics Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of early childhood education or programming robots
context.additional_context: Participants are general citizens with diverse backgrounds, learning practical instructional design methods applicable to early childhood education settings

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three pedagogical approaches (didactic play, guided play, free play) in programming robot education for young children.
Learners can apply a process to design robotics education activities tailored to age and developmental stages.
Learners can devise methods to measure learning effectiveness for young children through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
